resources.string: The Arabic Almanac app needs to download some necessay files, which can be large (~ 60 MB). To avoid extra data usage charges, please use Wi-Fi.

This app has been put together to help students of the Arabic language. Instead of having to carry around a bulky dictionary (believe me, I've been there), you can now access the same information at the luxury of your fingertips. 
 
You can search for the roots of a word either using by an Arabic keyboard or by using roman (english) letters in case you don't have an Arabic keyboard. The letters are replaced according to the following table: 

Double letters:
 	 th/v/V = "ث" 		 gh/g/G = "غ"
 	 kh/x/X = "خ" 		 sh/$ = "ش"
 	 dh = "ذ" 
 
 Different cases:
 	 d = "د" 		 t = "ت"
 	 D = "ض"	 T = "ط"
 	 z = "ز" 		 h = "ه"
 	 Z = "ظ" 	 H = "ح"
 	 s = "س" 
 	 S = "ص" 
 
 All other "normal" letters:
 	 a/A = "ا" 		 q/Q = "ق"
 	 b/B = "ب" 	 k/K = "ك"
 	 j/J = "ج" 		 l/L = "ل"
 	 No.7 = "ح" m/M = "م"
 	 r/R = "ر" 		 n/N = "ن"
 	 w/W = "و" 	 y/Y = "ي"
 	 f/F = "ف" 	 e/E/3 = "ع"
 
Please remember this developer in your duaas!!
